message.raw:
Ignore ports with no lines in manual mode.

This prevents a crash due to the NI_PCI_6534 having zero lines on port 4.
We could have had the introspection code ingore ports with no lines, but then
the port numbers would not be contiguous, since this device has a port 5.
Easier for now to keep the assumption of contiguous port numbers and simply not
use the ports with no lines. But we may revisit this if there are further
issues with this phantom port 4.
